name: UpdateFreshserviceTicketTask
description:
Update a task on a Freshservice ticket.

Use this tool to update an existing task on a ticket in Freshservice. This is helpful for modifying task details such as status, description, or other properties associated with a ticket's task.

parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: The ID of the ticket request to identify the specific ticket in Freshservice.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the task to be updated in Freshservice.

parameters.name: task_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details like status, title, agent_id, etc., to update the task.

created_by.description: Unique ID of the user who created the task

agent_id.description: Id of the agent to whom the task is assigned

parent_id.description: Unique ID of the parent entity to which the task belongs

parent_type.description: Type of the parent entity - [Ticket, Problem, Change, Release, Project]

notify_before.description: Time in seconds before which notification is sent prior to due date

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the task was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the task was updated

closed_at.description: Timestamp at which the task was closed

group_id.description: Unique ID of the group to which the task is assigned

start_date.description: Timestamp at which the task is started

value_schema.description: tassk details that needs to be updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
